about.title: Welcome To Le Salama Marrakech
about.content_1: Le Salama was born from a dream: to create a place where Moroccan tradition meets contemporary culture, where every dish tells a story, and where every meal becomes an unforgettable moment of sharing.
about.content_2: Le Salama is essential to your stay in Marrakech and is sure to delight all the senses in a colorful and vibrant evening of Moroccan food and entertainment.
about.content_3: We are open every evening and would be honored to welcome you!

events.title: Experience the Magic: Discover Our Shows!
events.content_1: To make the experience even more special, a belly dancer show takes place every night, adding an extra layer of excitement to your evening.
events.content_2: Whether youâ€™re relaxing with drinks, indulging in delicious food, or enjoying the entertainment, Le Salama is a must-visit during your stay in Marrakech, offering a feast for both the senses and the soul.

accordion.desc_1: Savor a fusion of local flavors and global delights.
accordion.desc_2: Dine under a canvas of stars, where every bite feels celestial.
accordion.desc_3: Witness the sky's breathtaking hues while indulging in culinary delights, where every sunset feels like a celebration.
accordion.desc_4: Experience an enchanting evening of live performances and vibrant nightlife.

culinary.title: A Unique Ambiance, Real culinary Experience
culinary.content_1: Le Salama offers an unforgettable Moroccan culinary experience in the heart of Jemaa El Fna, where you can enjoy lunch or an early dinner while soaking in an amazing view.
culinary.content_2: The vibrant rooftop sky bar is the perfect place to sip on expertly crafted cocktails, enjoy music and the lively vibe as the sun sets over Marrakech.
